name: Blastell GunTest
description:
Alright so for those whom help test!
 simple version
  • Basically find bugs
  • tell if game is fun and worth continuing!
  • tell if this form of attacking is an improvement
  • previous way of attacking can be downloaded on my other game

Join the discord or comment to give me thoughts!!

The main thing is to tell me if this new attacking is better than the original seen on my game SHEOL look at sheol its the same game just different name and test both versions to tell me which is the most good and tell me if the game is FUN! and WORTH CONTINUING!

you can also comment on twitter!
